CustomField.formula: IF( OpportunityRecordType__c == 'Equote',( CPQ_NetNewMRR__c * Opportunity_Contract_Term_Year__c * 12),IF(ContractMRR2__c > 0,(( ContractMRR2__c) * If(Term_Months__c<1,1,Term_Months__c)* Quantity),(( UnitPrice + Renewal_MRR__c) * If(Term_Months__c<1,1,Term_Months__c)* Quantity)))
CustomField.label: Contract MRR New
